full_summary:
Technical Advisor Required for Alexandra Bridge Replacement Project
===========================================================

**Tender Information**

* Title: Technical Advisor in support of the Alexandra Bridge Replacement Project
* Reference Number: WS3696558429-Doc3697280215
* Solicitation Number: WS3696558429
* Amendment Number: 13
* Publication Date: 06 October 2022
* Closing Date: 12 January 2023, 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: 01 March 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A

**EOI Overview**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested Bidders to respond to this solicitation for the provision of various professional services in the capacity of Technical Advisor (TA) for a period of approximately 11 years. The Technical Advisor will provide technical support to the Alexandra Bridge Replacement Project from the current pre-definition phase up to project definition and implementation.

**Key Requirements**

* The Technical Advisor will be responsible for providing technical expertise in the areas of professional engineering services and architectural engineering.
* The successful Bidder will be required to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by 12 January 2023 at 14:00 EST.
* Bids submitted after the specified closing time will be deemed non-responsive.

**Eligibility Criteria**

* This tender is open to Bidders who have the necessary expertise and experience to provide professional engineering services and architectural engineering.

**Category and Classification**

* Category: SRV (Services)
* UNSPSC Code: 81100000 (Professional engineering services) and 81101508 (Architectural engineering)

**Trade Agreements**

* This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others.

**Contact Information**

* Name: Francois Rosso (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: francois.rosso@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Office: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Phone: N/A
* Fax: N/A

**Attachments and Submission**

* No attachments are required for this tender.

Note: The information above is subject to change and may not be up to date. Bidders are required to verify the information through the Canada Buys or Ariba Discovery online platforms. The
